text: 4.10: Zo 15.16; Ro 5.8-10; Ta 3.4; 1 Zo 2.2Guma guigira won ndavar harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi tɨv, ana Fhe Bakɨmen tɨv ma. Nza khueŋ ndɨkndɨgɨ thari, nza fharav wari won ndavir Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨŋgi. Fhuvara! Fhe Bakɨme fharav guigira won ndavar nza nɨɨŋgi. Ana fharav guigira won ndavar nza nɨɨŋgiap, maaŋ muuŋgiap, ana won Kama sarigim, ana nza muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga nzuav rɨmɨn zav kha nuianan zergi. Ana zerav, rimgiap, nza muuŋgim, nza Fhe Bakɨme phorgap ndava bavira ki.
